types.name: ASIAlgorithm
types.description: ASI algorithm.

fields.name: gene
fields.description: Sequence gene and the reference sequence.

fields.name: firstAA
fields.description: The first aligned position (start from 1) in protein relative to the reference sequence.

fields.name: lastAA
fields.description: The last aligned position (start from 1) in protein relative to the reference sequence.

fields.name: firstNA
fields.description: The first aligned position (start from 1) in DNA relative to the input sequence.

fields.name: lastNA
fields.description: The last aligned position (start from 1) in DNA relative to the input sequence.

fields.name: matchPcnt
fields.description: The match percentage of input sequence aligned to the reference sequence.

fields.name: size
fields.description: The amino acid size of this sequence without unsequenced region (Ns).

fields.name: prettyPairwise
fields.description: Formatted pairwise output of the aligned sequence.

fields.name: alignedNAs
fields.description: Aligned DNA sequence without insertions and insertion gaps.

fields.name: alignedAAs
fields.description: Aligned protein sequence without insertions and insertion gaps. Mixtures are represented as "X".

fields.name: adjustedAlignedNAs
fields.description: (HXB2 numbering) adjusted aligned DNA sequence without insertions and insertion gaps.

fields.name: adjustedAlignedAAs
fields.description: (HXB2 numbering) adjusted aligned protein sequence without insertions and insertion gaps. Mixtures are represented as "X".

fields.name: mutations
fields.description: All mutations found in the aligned sequence.

args.name: filterOptions
args.description: List of filter options for the mutation set.

args.name: customList
args.description: List of possible mutation strings that should be included in this query if presented. Gene need to be prepend if the gene is not able to be inferred from the context.

fields.name: frameShifts
fields.description: All frame shifts found in the aligned sequence.

types.name: Boolean
types.description: The `Boolean` scalar type represents `true` or `false`.

types.name: BoundMutationComment
types.description: Comment bound to a certain mutation object.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Unique name of the comment.

fields.name: gene
fields.description: Corresponding gene.

fields.name: drugClass
fields.description: Corresponding drug class.

fields.name: type
fields.description: Mutation type of this comment.

fields.name: text
fields.description: Comment text.

fields.name: triggeredAAs
fields.description: Mutated amino acid(s) that triggered the comment.

fields.name: boundMutation
fields.description: The mutation that bound to this comment.

fields.name: highlightText
fields.description: Text should be highlighted in the comment.

types.name: BoundMutationPrevalence
types.description: Prevalence data for an input mutation.

fields.name: boundMutation
fields.description: The mutation matched these prevalence data.

fields.name: matched
fields.description: Prevalence data that matched the mutation.

fields.name: others
fields.description: Other prevalence data at the mutation position.

types.name: BoundSubtype
types.description: Subtype of certain sequence.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Name of the subtype.

fields.name: distancePcnt
fields.description: The distance percentage compares to the subtype of given sequence. 0.0 means completely the same.

fields.name: display
fields.description: String of shown subtype and distance percentage. The shown subtype can be in the form of unknown subtype of recombination like "B + C".

types.name: CommentType
types.description: Comment type.

fields.name: mutationType
fields.description: Type of these comments.

fields.name: commentType
fields.description: Type of these comments.

fields.name: comments
fields.description: Comments belong to this type.

fields.name: drug
fields.description: Drug of this score.

fields.name: algorithm
fields.description: The name of algorithm which calculated this score.

fields.name: SIR
fields.description: One of the three step resistance levels of the drug.

fields.name: interpretation
fields.description: Readable resistance level defined by the algorithm for the drug.

fields.name: explanation
fields.description: Text explanation on how this level get calculated.

types.name: DescriptiveStatistics
types.description: Descriptive statistics for a list of values.

fields.name: mean
fields.description: The arithmetic mean of the available values.

fields.name: standardDeviation
fields.description: The standard deviation of the available values.

fields.name: min
fields.description: The minimum of the available values.

fields.name: max
fields.description: The maximum of the available values.

fields.name: n
fields.description: The number of the available values.

fields.name: sum
fields.description: The sum of the available values.

fields.name: values
fields.description: The set of available values.

fields.name: percentile
fields.description: An estimate for the pth percentile of the stored values.

args.name: p
args.description: The requested percentile (scaled from 0 - 100)

types.name: Drug
types.description: HIV drug.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Name of the drug.

fields.name: displayAbbr
fields.description: Display abbreviation of the drug.

fields.name: fullName
fields.description: Full name of the drug.

fields.name: drugClass
fields.description: Drug class the drug belongs to.

types.name: DrugClass
types.description: HIV drug class.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Name of the drug class.

fields.name: fullName
fields.description: Full name of the drug class.

fields.name: drugs
fields.description: Drugs of this drug class.

fields.name: gene
fields.description: Gene the drug class belongs to.

types.name: DrugPartialScore
types.description: Partial score by mutation.

fields.name: mutations
fields.description: Score triggering mutations.

fields.name: score
fields.description: Score number.

fields.name: algorithm
fields.description: Get used drug resistance algorithm.

fields.name: gene
fields.description: Gene of the drug resistance report.

fields.name: drugScores
fields.description: List of drug levels and scores.

args.name: drugClass
args.description: Specify drug class. Leave this argument empty will return all drugs.

types.name: DrugResistanceAlgorithm
types.description: A drug resistance algorithm.

fields.name: text
fields.description: get key name of this algorithm.

fields.name: display
fields.description: algorithm family and version for display.

fields.name: family
fields.description: algorithm family.

fields.name: version
fields.description: algorithm version.

fields.name: strain
fields.description: algorithm target strain.

fields.name: publishDate
fields.description: Publish date of this version.

fields.name: drugClass
fields.description: The drug class.

fields.name: drug
fields.description: The drug.

fields.name: SIR
fields.description: One of the three step resistance levels of the drug.

fields.name: score
fields.description: Resistance score of the drug.

fields.name: level
fields.description: Resistance level (1 - 5) of the drug.

fields.name: text
fields.description: Readable resistance level of the drug.

fields.name: partialScores
fields.description: List of partial scores that contributed to this total score.

types.name: Float
types.description: The `Float` scalar type represents signed double-precision fractional values as specified by [IEEE 754](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_floating_point).

types.name: FrameShift
types.description: Frame shift (NAs length < 3) found in aligned sequence.

fields.name: gene
fields.description: Gene the frame shift belongs to.

fields.name: position
fields.description: Position of the frame shift.

fields.name: isInsertion
fields.description: The frame shift is an insertion or not.

fields.name: isDeletion
fields.description: The frame shift is a deletion or not.

fields.name: size
fields.description: DNA size of the frame shift.

fields.name: NAs
fields.description: Nucleic acid(s) of the frame shift.

fields.name: text
fields.description: Formatted readable text of this frame shift.

types.name: Gene
types.description: HIV genes. Accept PR, RT or IN.

fields.name: nameWithStrain
fields.description: Name of the gene (with strain name).

fields.name: name
fields.description: Name of the gene (without strain name).

fields.name: strain
fields.description: HIV strain referred by this gene.

fields.name: refSequence
fields.description: Reference sequence of this gene.

fields.name: length
fields.description: Length of current gene.

fields.name: drugClasses
fields.description: Supported drug classes of current gene.

fields.name: mutationTypes
fields.description: Supported mutation types of current gene.

fields.name: gene
fields.description: Sequence gene and the reference sequence.

fields.name: firstAA
fields.description: The first sequenced position (start from 1) in protein relative to the reference sequence.

fields.name: lastAA
fields.description: The last sequenced position (start from 1) in protein relative to the reference sequence.

fields.name: allPositionCodonReads
fields.description: Position codon reads in this gene sequence.

fields.name: internalJsonAllPositionCodonReads
fields.description: Position codon reads in this gene sequence (json formated).

args.name: mutationOnly
args.description: Exclude codons matched subtype B consensus.

args.name: maxProportion
args.description: Exclude codons with proportions higher than specified value (0 - 1).

args.name: minProportion
args.description: Exclude codons with proportions lower than specified value (0 - 1).

fields.name: size
fields.description: The amino acid size of this sequence including unsequenced region.

fields.name: numPositions
fields.description: The sequenced positions of this sequence.

fields.name: readDepthStats
fields.description: Descriptive statistics of all read depth.

fields.name: alignedNAs
fields.description: Aligned DNA sequence without insertions and insertion gaps.

fields.name: alignedAAs
fields.description: Aligned protein sequence without insertions and insertion gaps. Mixtures are represented as "X".

fields.name: mutations
fields.description: All mutations found in the aligned sequence.

args.name: filterOptions
args.description: List of filter options for the mutation set.

args.name: customList
args.description: List of possible mutation strings that should be included in this query if presented. Gene need to be prepend if the gene is not able to be inferred from the context.

fields.name: histogram
fields.description: Histogram data for sequence reads.

args.name: pcntLowerLimit
args.description: Percent lower limit of filtering codon reads (range: 0-100).

args.name: pcntUpperLimit
args.description: Percent lower limit of filtering codon reads (range: 0-100).

args.name: numBins
args.description: Number of bins wanted in this histogram. (either `numBins` or `binTicks` must be provided)

args.name: binTicks
args.description: Bin ticks wanted in this histogram. (either `numBins` or `binTicks` must be provided)

args.name: cumulative
args.description: Generate cumulative histogram data instead.

args.name: aggregatesBy
args.description: Aggregation option.

fields.name: display
fields.description: The display subtype(s) with the distance percent.

fields.name: displayWithoutDistance
fields.description: The display subtype(s) without the distance percent.

fields.name: subtype
fields.description: The original subtype found by comparison. The value of this field is UNPROCESSED. You probably want to use field `display` for the final result.

fields.name: displaySubtypes
fields.description: There are several rules applied for subtype displaying. This field lists subtypes that were used in constructing the final result in `display` and `displayWithoutDistance`.

fields.name: firstNA
fields.description: The first compared/matched NA position in HXB2.

fields.name: lastNA
fields.description: The last compared/matched NA position in HXB2.

fields.name: distance
fields.description: The distance between bound sequence and coressponding reference. Noted that 0 <= distance <= 1.

fields.name: distancePcnt
fields.description: The distance between bound sequence and coressponding reference. Noted that 0% <= distancePcnt <= 100%.

fields.name: referenceAccession
fields.description: Accession number of the reference being compared.

fields.name: referenceCountry
fields.description: Country where this reference sequence was collected.

fields.name: referenceYear
fields.description: Year this reference sequence was collected.

fields.name: discordanceList
fields.description: A full list of HXB2 positions that present with discordance.

types.name: HIVClassificationLevel
types.description: Classification level of genotypes: species, group or subtype.

fields.name: indexName
fields.description: Short name of current species, group, or subtype. Also used for indexing internally.

fields.name: displayName
fields.description: Full name of current species, group, or subtype.

fields.name: classificationLevel
fields.description: Classification level of the subtype.

types.name: Int
types.description: The `Int` scalar type represents non-fractional signed whole numeric values. Int can represent values between -(2^31) and 2^31 - 1.

types.name: Long
types.description: Long type

fields.name: gene
fields.description: Mutation gene.

fields.name: reference
fields.description: Amino acid reference at this gene sequence position.

fields.name: position
fields.description: Position of the mutation.

fields.name: displayAAs
fields.description: The mutated AA(s) with possibly inserted AA(s).

fields.name: AAs
fields.description: The mutated AA(s) with possibly inserted AA(s). Highly ambiguous mixture is not replaced to X.

fields.name: displayAAChars
fields.description: A list of AAs.

fields.name: AAChars
fields.description: A list of AAs. Highly ambiguous mixture is not replaced to X.

fields.name: triplet
fields.description: The mutated codon when the mutation is extracting from an aligned sequence.

fields.name: insertedNAs
fields.description: The inserted codon(s) when the mutation is extracting from an aligned sequence.

fields.name: isInsertion
fields.description: The mutation is an insertion or not.

fields.name: isDeletion
fields.description: The mutation is a deletion or not.

fields.name: isIndel
fields.description: The mutation is an insertion/deletion, or not.

fields.name: isAmbiguous
fields.description: The mutation is a highly ambiguous mutation or not.

fields.name: isApobecMutation
fields.description: The mutation is a signature APOBEC-mediated G-to-A hypermutation or not.

fields.name: isApobecDRM
fields.description: The mutation is a drug resistance mutation (DRM) might be caused by APOBEC-mediated G-to-A hypermutation or not.

fields.name: isUnsequenced
fields.description: If the mutation is from unsequenced region.

fields.name: isDRM
fields.description: If the mutation is a drug resistance mutation (DRM) or not.

fields.name: hasStop
fields.description: The mutation contains stop codon or not.

fields.name: isUnusual
fields.description: The mutation is a low prevalence (unusual) mutation or not.

fields.name: isSDRM
fields.description: The mutation is a Surveillance Drug Resistance Mutation (SDRM) or not.

fields.name: types
fields.description: Ordered list of mutation type(s). List size can be larger than 1 when the mutation is a mixture.

fields.name: primaryType
fields.description: Primary type of the mutation.

fields.name: comments
fields.description: Mutation comments.

fields.name: text
fields.description: Formatted text of the mutation (without gene).

fields.name: shortText
fields.description: Formatted short text of the mutation (without gene).

types.name: MutationPrevalence
types.description: Prevalence data for a single mutation.

fields.name: AA
fields.description: The amino acid at this position.

fields.name: subtype
fields.description: Subtype this prevalence belongs to.

fields.name: totalNaive
fields.description: Total number of naive samples which contain the mutation position.

fields.name: frequencyNaive
fields.description: Total number of naive samples which contain the mutation.

fields.name: percentageNaive
fields.description: Proportion of certain mutation occured in the naive samples which contain that position. Equals to 100 * frequencyNaive / totalNaive.

fields.name: totalTreated
fields.description: Total number of treated samples which contain the mutation position.

fields.name: frequencyTreated
fields.description: Total number of treated samples which contain the mutation.

fields.name: percentageTreated
fields.description: Proportion of certain mutation occured in the treated samples which contain that position. Equals to 100 * frequencyTreated / totalTreated.

types.name: MutationPrevalenceByAA
types.description: Prevalence data for a single AA (or ins/deletion).

fields.name: AA
fields.description: The amino acid.

fields.name: subtypes
fields.description: Prevalence data of each subtype.

types.name: MutationPrevalenceSubtype
types.description: Main subtype that mutation prevalence supported.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Subtype name.

fields.name: stats
fields.description: Sbutype statistics by genes.

types.name: MutationPrevalenceSubtypeStat
types.description: Statistics data for the subtype.

fields.name: gene
fields.description: Gene the statistic belongs to.

fields.name: totalNaive
fields.description: Total number of naive samples.

fields.name: totalTreated
fields.description: Total number of treated samples.

types.name: MutationSetFilterOption
types.description: Filter option for mutation set.

enumValues.name: APOBEC
enumValues.description: List only mutations which are APOBEC-mediated G-to-A hypermutation.

enumValues.name: APOBEC_DRM
enumValues.description: List only drug resistance mutations which are APOBEC-mediated G-to-A hypermutation.

enumValues.name: DRM
enumValues.description: List only mutations which are drug resistance mutation (DRM).

enumValues.name: DRP
enumValues.description: List all mutations at DRM positions (no need to be DRMs).

enumValues.name: notDRM
enumValues.description: List only mutations which are not drug resistance mutation (DRM).

enumValues.name: PI_DRM
enumValues.description: List only mutations which are PI DRM.

enumValues.name: NRTI_DRM
enumValues.description: List only mutations which are NRTI DRM.

enumValues.name: NNRTI_DRM
enumValues.description: List only mutations which are NNRTI DRM.

enumValues.name: INSTI_DRM
enumValues.description: List only mutations which are INSTI DRM.

enumValues.name: SDRM
enumValues.description: List only mutations which are surveillance drug resistance mutations (SDRM).

enumValues.name: notSDRM
enumValues.description: List only mutations which are not sruveillance drug resistance mutation (SDRM).

enumValues.name: PI_SDRM
enumValues.description: List only mutations which are PI SDRM.

enumValues.name: NRTI_SDRM
enumValues.description: List only mutations which are NRTI SDRM.

enumValues.name: NNRTI_SDRM
enumValues.description: List only mutations which are NNRTI SDRM.

enumValues.name: INSTI_SDRM
enumValues.description: List only mutations which are INSTI SDRM.

enumValues.name: TSM
enumValues.description: List only mutations which are treatment-selected mutations (TSM).

enumValues.name: notTSM
enumValues.description: List only mutations which are not treatment-selected mutations (TSM).

enumValues.name: PI_TSM
enumValues.description: List only mutations which are PI TSM.

enumValues.name: NRTI_TSM
enumValues.description: List only mutations which are NRTI TSM.

enumValues.name: NNRTI_TSM
enumValues.description: List only mutations which are NNRTI TSM.

enumValues.name: INSTI_TSM
enumValues.description: List only mutations which are INSTI TSM.

enumValues.name: AMBIGUOUS
enumValues.description: List all highly-ambiguous (HBDVN) mutations.

enumValues.name: STOPCODON
enumValues.description: List only mutations with stop codon(s).

enumValues.name: CUSTOMLIST
enumValues.description: Accept a custom list of mutations and find the intersects.

types.description: Mutation type.

types.name: OneCodonReads
types.description: A single codon reads.

fields.name: codon
fields.description: The triplet codon. Insertion should be append to the triplet NAs directly. Deletion should use '-'.

fields.name: reads
fields.description: Number of reads for this codon.

fields.name: refAminoAcid
fields.description: The corresponding reference amino acid.

fields.name: aminoAcid
fields.description: The corresponding amino acid.

fields.name: proportion
fields.description: Codon proportion of current position (0.0 - 1.0)

fields.name: codonPercent
fields.description: Codon prevalence in HIVDB database (0.0 - 1.0)

fields.name: aaPercent
fields.description: Amino acid prevalence in HIVDB database (0.0 - 1.0)

fields.name: isReference
fields.description: The amino acid is the same as the reference (consensus) amino acid.

fields.name: isDRM
fields.description: The amino acid is a known drug resistance mutation (DRM).

fields.name: isUnusual
fields.description: The amino acid is an unusual mutation.

fields.name: isApobecMutation
fields.description: The amino acid is a signature APOBEC-mediated hypermutation.

fields.name: isApobecDRM
fields.description: The amino acid is a drug resistance mutation (DRM) might be caused by APOBEC-mediated G-to-A hypermutation.

fields.name: gene
fields.description: Gene of this record.

fields.name: position
fields.description: Codon position in this gene.

fields.name: totalReads
fields.description: Total reads of this position.

fields.name: isTrimmed
fields.description: This position is trimmed or not.

types.name: OneCodonReadsInput

inputFields.name: codon
inputFields.description: The triplet codon. Insertion should be append to the triplet NAs directly. Deletion should use '-'.

types.name: PositionCodonReads

args.description: Sequences to be analyzed.

args.description: Mutations to be analyzed.

fields.name: patternAnalysis
fields.description:
Analyze mutation patterns (multiple lists of mutations) and output result.
The output list will be in the same order as the input list.

args.description: Lists of mutations to be analyzed.

args.name: patternNames
args.description: Optional name for each mutation set. Length must be same to patterns.

fields.description: List all supported genes.

args.description: Genes to be requested.

fields.name: inputSequence
fields.description: The original unaligned sequence.

fields.name: strain

fields.name: isReverseComplement
fields.description: True if the alignment result was based on the reverse complement of input sequence.

fields.name: availableGenes
fields.description: Available genes found in the sequence.

fields.name: validationResults
fields.description: Validation results for this sequence.

fields.name: alignedGeneSequences
fields.description: List of aligned sequence distinguished by genes.

fields.name: subtypesV2
fields.description: List of HIV1 groups or subtypes, or HIV species. Sorted by the similarity from most to least.

args.description: Fetch only the first nth closest subtypes. Default to 2.

fields.name: bestMatchingSubtype
fields.description: The best matching subtype.

fields.name: genotypes
fields.description: List of HIV1 groups or subtypes, or HIV species. Sorted by the similarity from most to least.

args.description: Fetch only the first nth closest genotypes. Default to 2.

fields.name: mixturePcnt

fields.name: mutations

args.description: List of possible mutation strings that should be included in this query if presented. Gene need to be prepend if the gene is not able to be inferred from the context.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Name of this sequence.

fields.name: strain
fields.description: Strain of this sequence.

fields.name: cutoffSuggestionLooserLimit
fields.description: Algorithm suggested minimal prevalence cutoff. This cutoff is looser and may include more problematic mutations.

fields.name: cutoffSuggestionStricterLimit
fields.description: Algorithm suggested minimal prevalence cutoff. This cutoff is stricter and include less problematic mutations.

fields.name: validationResults
fields.description: Validation results for the sequence reads.

fields.name: minPrevalence
fields.description: The minimal prevalence cutoff applied on this sequence. If the same name field didn't specified in `SequenceReadsInput`, this value was dynamically selected by the program based on sequencing quality.

fields.name: minReadDepth
fields.description: The minimal read depth for each codon of the sequence reads.

fields.name: availableGenes
fields.description: Available genes found in the sequence reads.

fields.name: allGeneSequenceReads
fields.description: List of sequence reads distinguished by genes.

fields.name: subtypes
fields.description: List of HIV1 groups or subtypes, or HIV species. Sorted by the similarity from most to least.

args.name: first
args.description: Fetch only the first nth closest subtypes. Default to 2.

fields.name: bestMatchingSubtype
fields.description: The best matching subtype.

fields.name: mixturePcnt
fields.description: Mixture pecentage of the consensus. Notes only RYMWKS are counted.

fields.name: mutations
fields.description: All mutations found in the sequence reads.

args.name: filterOptions
args.description: List of filter options for the mutation set.

args.name: customList
args.description: List of possible mutation strings that should be included in this query if presented. Gene need to be prepend if the gene is not able to be inferred from the context.

fields.name: drugResistance
fields.description: List of drug resistance results by genes.

args.name: algorithm
args.description: One of the built-in ASI algorithms.

fields.name: histogram
fields.description: Histogram data for sequence reads.

args.name: pcntLowerLimit
args.description: Percent lower limit of filtering codon reads (range: 0-100).

args.name: pcntUpperLimit
args.description: Percent lower limit of filtering codon reads (range: 0-100).

args.name: numBins
args.description: Number of bins wanted in this histogram. (either `numBins` or `binTicks` must be provided)

args.name: binTicks
args.description: Bin ticks wanted in this histogram. (either `numBins` or `binTicks` must be provided)

args.name: cumulative
args.description: Generate cumulative histogram data instead.

args.name: aggregatesBy
args.description: Aggregation option.

fields.name: readDepthStats
fields.description: Descriptive statistics of all read depth.

fields.name: codonReadsCoverage
fields.description: Codon reads coverage.

fields.name: internalJsonCodonReadsCoverage
fields.description: Position codon reads in this gene sequence (json formated).

types.description: Histogram data for sequence reads.

fields.name: numPositions

types.name: SequenceReadsHistogramBin
types.description: A single bin data of the histogram.

fields.name: percentStart

fields.name: percentStop
fields.description: Percent stop (X axis) of this bin.

fields.name: count
fields.description: Total count (Y axis) of this bin.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: An identifiable name for identifying the result from the returning list.

inputFields.name: strain
inputFields.description: Strain of this sequence, choice: HIV1, HIV2A, HIV2B.

inputFields.name: allReads
inputFields.description: List of all reads belong to this sequence.

inputFields.name: minPrevalence
inputFields.description: The minimal prevalence cutoff to apply on each codon. Leave this field empty or specify a negative number to use the dynamic cutoff based on sequencing quality.

inputFields.name: minReadDepth
inputFields.description: The minal read depth for each codon. Default to 1000 if this field was left empty or had a negative numberspecified.

types.name: SierraVersion
types.description: Version of Sierra.

fields.name: text
fields.description: Version text.

fields.name: publishDate
fields.description: Publish date of this version.

types.name: Strain
types.description: HIV strain.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Short name of this strain.

fields.name: display
fields.description: Full name of this strain.

types.name: String
types.description: The `String` scalar type represents textual data, represented as UTF-8 character sequences. The String type is most often used by GraphQL to represent free-form human-readable text.

types.name: Subtype
types.description: SubtypeName

types.name: UnalignedSequenceInput
types.description: Unaligned sequence Input Type.

inputFields.name: sequence
inputFields.description: The sequence itself as a string.

types.name: UnalignedSequenceOutput
types.description: Unaligned sequence.

fields.name: header
fields.description: Name of the sequence.

fields.name: sequence
fields.description: The sequence itself as a string.

fields.name: MD5
fields.description: Hex MD5 value of the sequence.

fields.name: SHA512
fields.description: Hex SHA512 value of the sequence.

types.name: ValidationLevel
types.description: Level for validation result.

types.name: ValidationResult

fields.name: level

fields.name: message
fields.description: Description of this validation result.

fields.name: currentVersion

fields.name: currentProgramVersion

fields.name: sequenceAnalysis
fields.description: Analyze sequences and output results.

args.name: sequences
args.description: Sequences to be analyzed.

fields.name: sequenceReadsAnalysis
fields.description: Analyze sequence reads and output results.

args.name: sequenceReads
args.description: Sequence reads to be analyzed.

fields.name: mutationsAnalysis
fields.description: Analyze a list of mutations belong to a single sequence and output result.

args.name: mutations
args.description: Mutations to be analyzed.

fields.name: patternAnalysis
fields.description:
Analyze mutation patterns (multiple lists of mutations) and output result.
The output list will be in the same order as the input list.

args.name: patterns
args.description: Lists of mutations to be analyzed.

args.name: patternNames
args.description: Optional name for each mutation set. Length must be same to patterns.

fields.name: genes
fields.description: List all supported genes.

args.name: names
args.description: Genes to be requested.

fields.name: mutationPrevalenceSubtypes
fields.description: List all supported HIV-1 subtypes by mutation prevalence.

types.name: __Directive
types.description:
A Directive provides a way to describe alternate runtime execution and type validation behavior in a GraphQL document.

In some cases, you need to provide options to alter GraphQL's execution behavior in ways field arguments will not suffice, such as conditionally including or skipping a field. Directives provide this by describing additional information to the executor.

types.name: __DirectiveLocation
types.description: A Directive can be adjacent to many parts of the GraphQL language, a __DirectiveLocation describes one such possible adjacencies.

enumValues.name: QUERY
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a query operation.

enumValues.name: MUTATION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a mutation operation.

enumValues.name: SUBSCRIPTION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a subscription operation.

enumValues.name: FIELD
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a field.

enumValues.name: FRAGMENT_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a fragment definition.

enumValues.name: FRAGMENT_SPREAD
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a fragment spread.

enumValues.name: INLINE_FRAGMENT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an inline fragment.

enumValues.name: VARIABLE_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a variable definition.

enumValues.name: SCHEMA
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a schema definition.

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a scalar definition.

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an object type definition.

enumValues.name: FIELD_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a field definition.

enumValues.name: ARGUMENT_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an argument definition.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an interface definition.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a union definition.

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an enum definition.

enumValues.name: ENUM_VALUE
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an enum value definition.

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an input object type definition.

enumValues.name: INPUT_FIELD_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an input object field definition.

types.name: __EnumValue
types.description: One possible value for a given Enum. Enum values are unique values, not a placeholder for a string or numeric value. However an Enum value is returned in a JSON response as a string.

types.name: __Field
types.description: Object and Interface types are described by a list of Fields, each of which has a name, potentially a list of arguments, and a return type.

types.name: __InputValue
types.description: Arguments provided to Fields or Directives and the input fields of an InputObject are represented as Input Values which describe their type and optionally a default value.

fields.name: defaultValue
fields.description: A GraphQL-formatted string representing the default value for this input value.

types.name: __Schema
types.description: A GraphQL Schema defines the capabilities of a GraphQL server. It exposes all available types and directives on the server, as well as the entry points for query, mutation, and subscription operations.

fields.name: types
fields.description: A list of all types supported by this server.

fields.name: queryType
fields.description: The type that query operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: mutationType
fields.description: If this server supports mutation, the type that mutation operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: subscriptionType
fields.description: If this server support subscription, the type that subscription operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: directives
fields.description: A list of all directives supported by this server.

types.name: __Type
types.description:
The fundamental unit of any GraphQL Schema is the type. There are many kinds of types in GraphQL as represented by the `__TypeKind` enum.

Depending on the kind of a type, certain fields describe information about that type. Scalar types provide no information beyond a name, description and optional `specifiedByUrl`, while Enum types provide their values. Object and Interface types provide the fields they describe. Abstract types, Union and Interface, provide the Object types possible at runtime. List and NonNull types compose other types.

types.name: __TypeKind
types.description: An enum describing what kind of type a given `__Type` is.

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a scalar.

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an object. `fields` and `interfaces` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an interface. `fields`, `interfaces`, and `possibleTypes` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a union. `possibleTypes` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an enum. `enumValues` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an input object. `inputFields` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: LIST
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a list. `ofType` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: NON_NULL
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a non-null. `ofType` is a valid field.

directives.name: include
directives.description: Directs the executor to include this field or fragment only when the `if` argument is true

args.name: if
args.description: Included when true.

directives.name: skip
directives.description: Directs the executor to skip this field or fragment when the `if`'argument is true.

args.name: if
args.description: Skipped when true.
